item.description:
Dear Members,

Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting group.
How was your summer, last month we had a wonderful discussion in peace abbey! Thanks to Bill, Fred, Shang-sheng and many from other group! I learned a lot.

This month I would like to discuss more about "PEACE".
This is a world that everyone dreams of. What is it? How does it look like? You and I may have very different point of view. Now it is time we can share about it.
The most important key is how do we achieve it?

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and let's create peaceful energy to the whole world.

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the second building on your right hand side, when you come into the condos
item.name: Westborough Spirituality October Meetup: topic PEACE
